title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #123
body:
## Date and Time

Dec 05, 2023 at **15:00 UTC** [Please note the change of meeting time]

## Location 

Join Zoom Meeting
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09
Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A


## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 0. [Ecosystem Project Demo] 
- [Kurtosis](https://youtu.be/bjnG-IdSBjo)

### 1. Ethereum network upgrades
- [Cancun](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/cancun.md) & [Deneb](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/tree/dev/specs/deneb) upgrade
  - [Devnet 12 explorer](https://dora.dencun-devnet-12.ethpandaops.io/)
  - [Goerli Long Term Support Update](https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/11/30/goerli-lts-update)
  - Meta EIPs for upgrades
- [Dencun Interop Testing Call 35](https://youtu.be/8EmUgPWbdU4)
- [Prague/Electra Network Upgrade Meta Thread](https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/prague-electra-network-upgrade-meta-thread/16809)

####  Useful resources
- Changes included in the Network Upgrade - [Dencun](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/dencun/)
- Dencun upgrade [PEEPanEIP Playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxpnKFDl1KzGOKqwux5JaLlv)
 
### 2. Other Protocol Development & Research
  - [Verkle Implementers Call 8](https://youtu.be/UOEfqSfE4wg)
  - EOF Implementers [Meeting 26] TBA

### 3. Events, Fellowship, Hackathon
- [Application Open for Next Billion Fellowship Cohort 4](https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/11/28/nxbn-cohort4-apply) until January 15th, 2024,
- [ConsenSys Academy](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/196_rR1guNkCbai9GnkuGmrPQmL8COei_35SPkU6Akho/edit#slide=id.g55d2cabac8_1_10)
- [Eth Denver](https://www.ethdenver.com/) - Feb 23 - March 03, 2024
- [Eth Berlin](https://ethberlin.org/) - May 24-26, 2024
- [EthIndia](https://ethindia.co/) - 8-10 Dec, 2023

### 4. New initiative/association/team discussion
- Chinese Subtitle of PEEP videos - Holesky
- [Ecosystem Project Demo](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxrhbMXuCqMsCiwx1lwu_cNs) 
  - [Ep 7 - Kurtosis](https://youtu.be/bjnG-IdSBjo)
- [Meet The Herders](https://hackmd.io/@hgedia/B1D3uPhAh) 
  - [Ep 3 - William S.]
- Potential new ideas for community engagement

### 5. General updates/discussion
- ECH Stats.
    - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/EthCatHerders) - 6770 Followers
    - [Discord](https://discord.io/EthCatHerders) - 2255 users
    - [YouTube](https://studio.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A) - 3246 subscribers
    - [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/ethereum-cat-herders/) - 300 Followers
- ECH engineering
  - [ECH Website](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/) 
    - [ ] [Dencun](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/dencun)    
    - [ ] [Ethereum Testnets](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/testnets/)
    - [ ] Meet The Herders [proposed design](https://www.figma.com/file/uXsNK9RsQs9xtT71LKsGL0/Ethereum-Cat-Herders?type=design&node-id=531-2&mode=design)
    - [ ] Ecosystem Project Demo [Proposed design] - TBA
  - Learn2Earn (Dencun)
     - [ ] NFT Design - Ready
     - [ ] Questions (20-25)
     - [ ] UI design - WIP 

- ECH Operations 
   - [YouTube Shorts](https://studio.youtube.com/playlist/PL4cwHXAawZxr020waJCI0dZAfPAW2naK1/videos)
     - PEEPanEIP shorts [Community Playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxr020waJCI0dZAfPAW2naK1)
        - [ECH Podcast](https://open.spotify.com/show/7dgxKMkSyy3HWtQW7OfqXA)
- [EIPs Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight) & [EIPsInsight website](https://eipsinsight.com/insight/2023/12) 
- [PEEPanEIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  
    - Upcoming meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)
- ECH Funding
  - [ ] Octant - [Epoch 2] - require updates to be posted
  - [ ] OP - [RPGF](https://vote.optimism.io/retropgf/3/application/0xfcc4798ccc9e2f578ce316278aa40da3fcee3c3f0b92c265062cf31906f2e815) - Ongoing
  - [ ] Giveth
  - [ ] CLR
  - [ ] Gitcoin Grant 19
- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 
  - All Core Dev Execution [Notes 175]
  - All Core Dev Consensus [Notes 123](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/918)
  - EIPIP [meeting 94](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/pull/299)
  - EIP Editing Office Hour Meeting [Agenda 29](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/298), [Recording Meeting 28](https://youtu.be/exCcwWdH82s)
### 6. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- Meeting [122]

## The date for the next meeting is Dec 19 2023 at 14:00 UTC

 (If anything else, leave a comment.)
Cancelling the meeting due to low attendance. I will publish a Medium post to provide a summary.
